Class ServiceGroup

extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represetns servicegroup that inclides a list of incidents.
    Author:
    Meles

      • setIncidentCounter

        public void setIncidentCounter()
        a method to set the incident counter, if the incidnets size is zero it will set the counter by default to "1". other wise it will set the counter one higher the the last incident in the list.

      • addIncident

        public void addIncident​(Incident incidents)
        A method to add incdient by a sorted order by thier id and after adding the incidents the counter is incremnted so the it is ready for the next id to be added.
        Parameters:
        incidents - a representation of an incident
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if passed incidents to be added are duplicates by thier id's

        an arraylist of incidents

      • getIncidentById

        public Incident getIncidentById​(int id)
        a method that retrives incidents with the given index number, otherwise it would just retrun null.
        Parameters:
        id - an integer referance of an incident
        Returns:
        an incident or null if the incidents can not be found.
